Mobile Matters05 Dec 2011

I recently had the privilege of discussing why mobile matters with the big wigs at Oneupweb. I put together a slideshow built using HTML5, Skeleton CSS, and the jQuery plugin Flexslider to illustrate why mobile matters. The slideshow itself is completely responsive - swipe gestures included! I gathered sources from the GOMO initiative as well as a couple of other sources to really make the case that WE CAN DO THIS and WE SHOULD DO THIS. Mobile is a good idea. Check it out on your desktops, on your phones, on your iPads! Do it!
